price: (Manzannin) Suka ce: "Yã Lũɗu! Lalle mũ, manzannin Ubangijinka ne. Bã zã su iya sãduwa zuwa gare ka ba. Sai ka yi tafiyarka a wani yankin dare da iyãlinka, kuma kada wani daga gare ku ya waiwaya fãce mãtarka. Lalle ne abin da ya same su mai sãmunta ne. Lalle wa'adinsu lõkacin sãfiya ne. Shin lõkacin sãfiya bã kusa ba ne?"
arabic: قَالُواْ يَٰلُوطُ إِنَّا رُسُلُ رَبِّكَ لَن يَصِلُوٓاْ إِلَيۡكَۖ فَأَسۡرِ بِأَهۡلِكَ بِقِطۡعٖ مِّنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ وَلَا يَلۡتَفِتۡ مِنكُمۡ أَحَدٌ إِلَّا ٱمۡرَأَتَكَۖ إِنَّهُۥ مُصِيبُهَا مَآ أَصَابَهُمۡۚ إِنَّ مَوۡعِدَهُمُ ٱلصُّبۡحُۚ أَلَيۡسَ ٱلصُّبۡحُ بِقَرِيبٖ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qālū yālūṭu innā rusulu rabbika lan yaṣilū ilayka fa-asri bi-ahlika biqiṭ'ʿin mina al-layli walā yaltafit minkum aḥadun illā im'ra-ataka innahu muṣībuhā mā aṣābahum inna mawʿidahumu al-ṣub'ḥu alaysa al-ṣub'ḥu biqarībin
